prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with majestic wings and a sleek body design.
Imagine a legendary bird Pokemon with frosty blue feathers and sharp, elegant features.
Show me a mystical creature that embodies the essence of winter and has stunning colors.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a graceful ice bird soaring through a snowy landscape.
Design a unique Pokemon with icy accents and a powerful presence in the sky.
Make a Pokemon that captures the spirit of cold winds and shimmering ice crystals.
Give me an elegant ice-type Pokemon that can glide effortlessly through the clouds.
